message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your value for the product, but I believe I can't exceed $150. Would you be able to adjust the price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $165?
Thank you for your follow-up offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $155. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
